p: The mean and median baseline CD4 counts increased from 2004 to 2017 in both Johannesburg and Mopani districts ( Figure 2a and b). The increase has been consistent in Johannesburg, but Mopani took a longer time to show this trend, with a consistent increase only being evident from 2009. Although the proportion of baseline CD4 counts < 200 cells/mm 3 has decreased over time, particularly from 2009, there has been no decrease in the last 2 years, with percentage counts < 200 cells/mm 3 remaining at ± 40% in Johannesburg and ± 35% in Mopani ( Figure 2c and d).
